objects.name: Attack Flow
objects.description: Extends STIX 2.1 with features to create Attack Flows.

external_references.description: Source code repository for Attack Flow

objects.name: Example Attack Tree
objects.description: This flow illustrates how to build an attack tree using Attack Flow Builder.

objects.name: Acquire User Location Information From the Web
Purchase Dataset Containing User Location Information
Find a Free Copy of the Dataset Containing User Location Information
Synthesize Known User Data and Information Within Dataset
Access Tracker Data via Web Portal
Leverage Existing User Credentials On The Web
Acquire User Credentials From Public Database
Take Credentials Directly From the User
Associate the Device with a Unique Identifier
Get Within Wireless Range of the Device
Configure an Alternative Server Address Inside Victim’s Smartphone App
Associate Tracker With a Controlled Device Account
Replay Authentication Sequence Over Local BLE
Get Within Wireless Range of the Device
Associate Data with Unique Device ID
Re-Associate Device To Controlled User Account
